description:
Now works with the TouchPad!

ABC Trace Free is a fun & engaging way to teach children how to write the letters of the alphabet. 

New feature: Progress Indicator!

More letters, louder audio, full screen, larger reward character and audio name of reward character.

This free version includes seven letters. Each letter is traceable and includes a fun picture with audio feedback of the letter on the screen. By using their finger to trace, they are learning the shape & name of the letter. This app reinforces eye, hand, and audio coordination.

ABC Trace Free also includes a link to our fun coloring pages website. The full version includes access to matching coloring pages for ABCs and numbers. All original work is artist drawn.  

ABC Trace Free is a great way to teach your child the alphabet and keep them entertained at the same time.

Smart Kids on the Run - Making learning on the go easy!
versionNote: Support for TouchPad now included with trace and show reward character modes.
